description: Getting this issue right will help Democrats politically in the near term, and will, in the long haul, strengthen our democracy immeasurably.
title: To win the working class, Democrats should champion patriotic education

description: President Biden said Thursday that he hopes President-elect Trump “rethinks” some of his tariff plans. “I hope he rethinks it. I think it’s a counterproductive thing to do,” the president said in Nantucket, Mass., discussing tariff plans for Canada and Mexico by the incoming president, according to a pool report. “We’re surrounded by the Pacific…
title: Biden on Trump’s tariff plan: ‘I hope he rethinks it’

description: President Biden issued his final Thanksgiving Day message as president Thursday, sharing his gratitude for his supporters. “With hearts full of gratitude: Happy Thanksgiving, America,” Biden wrote on the social platform X, alongside a video. “Jill and I are so grateful for the trust you’ve placed in us these past four years — serving you…
title: Biden issues final heartfelt Thanksgiving message as president: ‘We keep going’

description: National political correspondent Maggie Haberman said Meta CEO Mark Zuckerberg’s recent visit to President-elect Trump’s Mar-a-Lago resort may show that industries are seeking to build a bridge with Trump ahead of the inauguration, and not the other way around. “It’s not clear that whether Zuckerberg sought this meeting or Trump sought this meeting, but one…
title: Haberman says Zuckerberg’s Mar-a-Lago visit a signal industry may be courting Trump

description: President-elect Trump has put the country’s top three trading partners on notice less than two months before he takes office. title: 5 takeaways from Trump’s new tariff threat

description: The Biden administration encouraged tribal management of several federal tracts of land in recent years.
title: Trump is likely to dial back tribal management of federal land

description: Former White House chief of staff Mick Mulvaney said he’s never seen the type of threats that President-elect Trump’s nominees are facing, noting that it’s a “sad result of the heightened rhetoric.” Mulvaney joined NewsNation’s Mike Viqueria on Wednesday for “The Hill” to discuss the threats against nominated officials and his time in Trump’s first…
title: Mulvaney says threats toward Trump picks is something he’s never seen: ‘Sad result of the heightened rhetoric’

By the time…
title: Trump says he’s planning ‘large-scale’ ad campaign on fentanyl crisis
